item.title: Who am I?
item.description: My name is Karol. I come from Poland where I was born and bred. More or less, I’ve got 15 years experience in IT industry. I work as a Linux Administrator and I’ve been doing that job for around 13 years now. More often than not, I spent lots of time at my black screen and making all things work well. Beyond that, I’m keen on experimenting with a plenty of software technologies cause make me fun.
